name: Indian Society For Applied Research & Development
briefDescription: As demand for community development task/activities of ISARD  is trying to cater the work are  multiple disciplinary in nature and such the primary field specialization of this organization cover:•	Capacity Building :Community Education, IEC and Training /Workshop •	Promoting Community Based Health care.: RCH/MCH  etc•	Prevention and Management of Communicable Disease (STD/HIV/AIDS and TB etc.)•	Awareness programme on Environment, Hygiene and Sanitation        •	Awareness programme  on Anemia and Malnutrition•	Population & Demography •	Poverty Alleviation: Micro credit/SHG and employment generation•	Women Empowerment :Gender sensitization and Development •	Survey /Research, Monitoring, Evaluation & Documentation  •	Oth
